text: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.
author: Bo Bennett

text: An excuse becomes an obstacle in your journey to success when it is made in place of your best effort or when it is used as the object of the blame.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success
author: Bo Bennett

text: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
author: Bo Bennett

text: If you want plenty of experience in dealing with difficult people, then have kids.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Faked enthusiasm is worse than bad acting - it is bad acting with the intent to deceive.
author: Bo Bennett

text: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Value people on their potential, not on their history.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Untapped potential is the difference between where a person is now and where he or she can be.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Martial arts is not about fighting; it's about building character.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Enthusiasm is not the same as just being excited. One gets excited about going on a roller coaster. One becomes enthusiastic about creating and building a roller coaster.
author: Bo Bennett

text: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Visualization is daydreaming with a purpose.
author: Bo Bennett

text: True popularity comes from acts of kindness rather than acts of stupidity.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions.
author: Bo Bennett

text: An objection is not a rejection; it is simply a request for more information.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Diplomacy is more than saying or doing the right things at the right time, it is avoiding saying or doing the wrong things at any time.
author: Bo Bennett

text: The discipline you learn and character you build from setting and achieving a goal can be more valuable than the achievement of the goal itself.
author: Bo Bennett

text: In sales, a referral is the key to the door of resistance.
author: Bo Bennett

text: A dead end can never be a one way street; you can always turn around and take another road.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Not managing your time and making excuses are two bad habits. Don't put them both together by claiming you 'don't have the time'.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Most of us are consumed with our own thoughts and desires and are not always thinking about what other people may want. This is not necessarily being egocentric; it is just being human.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Resume: a written exaggeration of only the good things a person has done in the past, as well as a wish list of the qualities a person would like to have.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success; they are interested in your money.
author: Bo Bennett

text: There is a misleading, unwritten rule that states if a quote giving advice comes from someone famous, very old, or Greek, then it must be good advice.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Communication is about being effective, not always about being proper.
author: Bo Bennett

text: Spend sometime this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
author: Bo Bennett

text: As sure as the spring will follow the winter, prosperity and economic growth will follow recession.
author: Bo Bennett
